channel.title: Hosting a 508 server
channel.description:
[center][size=10pt]Most of you reading this may think 'Oh thats easy' but the thing is how do i Host a 508 server?[/size]
A. do i have to change the ip in the source somewhere??? where if so??? B. IDK WHAT!??!!
Please can someone help me and explain fully and in detail.
Thanks in advanced[/center]

item.title: Hosting a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @jaredh jaredh
item.description:
@jaredh wrote:

thanks but i dont get how that will connect to me?

also when u run my 508 client it asks you to type in the ip-address

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting a 508 server
item.dc:creator: @razami razami
item.description:
@razami wrote:

Not in source.
You have to go to the client then find (gui).then open gui with notepad then press ctrl+f then serch serverip. then change the 0.0.0.0/127.0.0.1 to ur ip then save then compile the cleint then run it.

Read full topic
